question: لَتَأْتُنَّنِي
answer: that surely you will bring him to me

question: سَنُرَاوِدُ
answer: We will try to get permission

question: فَصَدَقَتْ
answer: then she has spoken the truth

question: تُفَنِّدُونِ
answer: you think me weakened in mind

question: نَبَّأْتُكُمَا
answer: I will inform both of you
